UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthetic antimicrobial peptides: From choice of the best sequences to action mechanisms.
Literature.Author: Souza PFN, Marques LSM, Oliveira JTA, Lima PG, Dias LP, Neto NAS, Lopes FES, Sousa JS, Silva AFB, Caneiro RF, Lopes JLS, Ramos MV, Freitas CDT

Literature.Title: Neutralizing Effect of Synthetic Peptides toward SARS-CoV-2.
Literature.Author: Souza PFN, vanTilburg MF, Mesquita FP, Amaral JL, Lima LB, Montenegro RC, Lopes FES, Martins RX, Vieira L, Farias DF, Monteiro-Moreira ACO, Freitas CDT, Bezerra AS, Guedes MIF, Castelo-Branco DSCM, Oliveira JTA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(0-10% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(0-10% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(0-10% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(0-10% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25619(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(no activity data),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(80-90% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(no activity data),Candida tropicalis(no activity data),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(90-100% Inhibition=50µg/ml),Trichophyton rubrum(10-20% Inhibition=50µg/ml),SARS-CoV-2(EC50=40µg/ml)
